GSP30kramstou:0: ayaṃ duḥkhavrātavrataparigame pāraṇavidhir mahāsaukhyāsāraprasaraṇarase durdinam idam |
GSP30kramstou:1: yad anyanyakkṛtyā viṣamaviśikhaploṣaṇaguror vibhoḥ stotre śaśvat pratiphalati ceto gatabhayam vimṛśya svātmānaṃ vimṛśati punaḥ stutyacaritaṃ tathā stotā stotre prakaṭayati bhedaikaviṣaye
GSP30kramstou:2: vimṛṣṭaś ca svātmā nikhilaviṣayajñānasamaye taditthaṃ tvatstotre 'ham iha satataṃ yatnarahitaḥ anāmṛṣṭaḥ svātmā na hi bhavati bhāvapramitibhāj anāmṛṣṭaḥ svātmety api hi na vinā 'marśanavidheḥ
GSP30kramstou:3: śivaś cāsau svātmā sphurad akhilabhāvaikasarasas tato 'ham
GSP30kramstou:5: vicitrair jātyādibhramaṇaparipāṭīparikarair avāptam sārvajñaṃ hṛdaya yad ayatnena bhavatā
GSP30kramstou:6: tad antas tvadbodhaprasarasaraṇībhūtamahasi sphuṭam vāci prāpya prakaṭaya vibhoḥ stotram adhunā vidhunvāno bandhābhimatabhavamārgasthitim imāṃ rasīkṛtyānantastutihutavahaploṣitabhedām |
GSP30kramstou:7: vicitrasvasphārasphuritamahimārambharabhasāt piban bhāvān etān varada madamatto 'smi sukhitaḥ bhava prājyaiśvaryaprathitabahuśakter bhagavato vicitraṃ cāritraṃ hṛdayam adhiśete yadi tataḥ
GSP30kramstou:8: kathaṃ stotraṃ kuryād atha ca kurute tena sahasā śivaikātmyaprāptau śivanatir upāyaḥ prathamakaḥ jvaladrūpaṃ bhāsvatpacanam atha dāhaṃ prakaṭanam vimucyānyad vahneḥ kim api ghaṭate naiva hi vapuḥ |
GSP30kramstou:9: stuve saṃvidraśmīn yadi nijanijāṃs tena sa nuto bhaven nānyaḥ kaścid bhavati parameśasya vibhavaḥ vicitrārambhatve galitaniyame yaḥ kila rasaḥ paricchedābhāvāt paramaparipūrṇatvam asamam |
GSP30kramstou:10: svayaṃ bhāsāṃ yogaḥ sakalabhavabhāvaikamayatāviruddhair dharmaughaiḥ paracitir anarghocitaguṇā itīdṛkṣair rūpair varada vividhaṃ te kila vapur vibhāti svāṃśe 'smin jagati gatabhedaṃ bhagavataḥ
GSP30kramstou:11: tad evaitatstotuṃ hṛdayam atha gīrbāhyakaraṇaprabandhāś ca syur me satatam aparityaktarabhasaḥ tavaivaikasyāntaḥ sphuritamahaso bodhajaladher vicitrormivrātaprasaraṇaraso yaḥ svarasataḥ
GSP30kramstou:12: ta evāmī sṛṣṭisthitilayamayasphūrjitarucāṃ śaśāṅkārkāgnīnāṃ yugapad udayāpāyavibhavāḥ || 10
GSP30kramstou:13: ataś citrācitrakramataditarādisthitijuṣo vibhoḥ śaktiḥ śaśvad vrajati na vibhedaṃ katham api
GSP30kramstou:14: tad etasyāṃ bhūmāv akulam iti te yat kila padaṃ tadekāgrībhūyān mama hṛdayabhūr bhairava vibho amuṣmāt saṃpūrnāt vata rasamahollāsasarasān nijāṃ śaktiṃ bhedaṃ gamayasi nijecchāprasarataḥ
GSP30kramstou:15: anarghaṃ svātantryaṃ tava tadidam atyadbhutamayīṃ bhavacchaktiṃ stunvan vigalitabhayo 'haṃ śivamayaḥ || 12 ||
GSP30kramstou:16: idantāvad rūpaṃ tava bhagavataḥ śaktisarasaṃ kramābhāvād eva prasabhavigalat kālakalanam |
GSP30kramstou:17: manaḥśaktyā vācāpy atha karaṇacakrair bahir atho ghaṭādyais tadrūpaṃ yugapad adhitiṣṭheyam aniśam || 13 ||
GSP30kramstou:18: kramollāsaṃ tasyāṃ bhuvi viracayan bhedakalanāṃ svaśaktīnāṃ deva prathayasi sadā svātmani tataḥ |
GSP30kramstou:19: kriyājñānecchākhyāṃ sthitilayamahāsṛṣṭivibhavāṃ trirūpaṃ bhūyāsaṃ samadhiśayituṃ vyagrahṛdayaḥ purā sṛṣṭir līnā hutavahamayī yātra vilaset parollāsaunmukhyaṃ vrajati śaśisaṃsparśasubhagā
GSP30kramstou:20: hutāśendusphārobhayavibhavabhāg bhairavavibho taveyaṃ sṛṣṭyākhyā mama manasi nityaṃ vilasatām visṛṣṭe bhāvāṃśe bahir atiśayāsvādavirase yadā tatraiva tvaṃ bhajasi rabhasād raktimayatām
GSP30kramstou:21: tadā raktā devī tava sakalabhāveṣu nanu māṃ kriyād raktāpānakramaghaṭitagoṣṭhīgataghṛṇam || bahir vṛttiṃ hātuṃ citibhuvam udārāṃ nivasituṃ yadā bhāvābhedaṃ prathayasi vinaṣṭormicapalaḥ
GSP30kramstou:22: sthiter nāśaṃ devī kalayati tadā sā tava vibho sthiteḥ sāṃsārikyāḥ kalayatu vināśaṃ mama sadā jagatsaṃhāreṇa praśamayitukāmaḥ svarabhasāt svaśaṅkātaṅkākhyaṃ vidhim atha niṣedhaṃ prathayasi
GSP30kramstou:23: yamaṃ sṛṣṭvetthaṃ tvaṃ punar api ca śaṅkāṃ vidalayan mahādevī seyaṃ mama bhavabhayaṃ saṃdalayatām vilīne śaṅkaughe sapadi paripūrṇe ca vibhave gate lokācāre galitavibhave śāstraniyame |
GSP30kramstou:24: anantaṃ bhogyaughaṃ grasitum abhito laṃpaṭarasā vibho saṃhārākhyā mama hṛdi bhidāṃśaṃ praharatu taditthaṃ devībhiḥ sapadi dalite bhedavibhave vikalpaprāṇāsau pravilasati mātṛsthitir alam
GSP30kramstou:25: ataḥ saṃhārāṃśam nijahṛdi vimṛśya sthitimayī prasannā syān mṛtyupralayakaraṇī me bhagavatī taditthaṃ te tisro nijavibhavavisphāraṇavaśād avāptāḥ ṣaṭcakrakramakṛtapadaṃ śaktaya imāḥ
GSP30kramstou:26: kramād unmeṣeṇa pravidadhati citrāṃ bhavadaśām imābhyo devībhyaḥ pravaṇahṛdayaḥ syāṃ gatabhayaḥ imāṃ rundhe bhūmiṃ bhavabhayabhidātaṅkakaraṇīm imāṃ bodhaikāntadrutirasamayīm cāpi vidadhe
GSP30kramstou:27: taditthaṃ saṃrodhaṃ drutim atha vilupyāśubhatatīr yatheṣṭaṃ cācāraṃ bhajati lasatāṃ sā mama hṛdi || 22 ||
GSP30kramstou:28: kriyābuddhyakṣādeḥ parimitapade mānapadavīm avāptasya sphāraṃ nijanijarucā saṃharati yā |
GSP30kramstou:29: iyaṃ mārta.ṅdasya sthitipadayujaḥ sāram akhilam haṭhād ākarṣantī kṛśatu mama bhedaṃ bhavabhayāt samagrām akṣālīṃ kramavirahitā sātmani muhur niveśyānantāntarbahalitamahāraśminivahā |
GSP30kramstou:30: parā divyānandaṃ kalayitum udārādaravatī prasannā me bhūyāt hṛdayapadavīṃ bhūṣayatu ca || pramāṇe saṃlīne śivapadalasadvaibhavavaśāt śarīraprāṇādir mitakṛtakamātṛsthitimayaḥ |
GSP30kramstou:31: yadā kālopādhiḥ pralayapadam āsādayati te tadā devī yāsau lasati mama sā syāc chivamayī || prakāśākhyā saṃvit kramavirahitā śūnyapadato bahirlīnātyantam prasarati samācchādakatayā |
GSP30kramstou:32: tato 'py antaḥsāre galitarabhasād akramatayā mahākālī seyaṃ mama kalayatāṃ kālam akhilam || tato devyāṃ yasyāṃ paramaparipūrṇasthitijuṣi kramaṃ vicchidyāśu sthitimatirasāt saṃvidadhati
GSP30kramstou:33: pramāṇaṃ mātāraṃ mitim atha samagraṃ jagad idaṃ sthitāṃ kroḍīkṛtya śrayatu mama cittaṃ citim imām || 27 ||
GSP30kramstou:34: anargalasvātmamaye maheśe tiṣṭhanti yasmin vibhuśaktayas tāḥ |
GSP30kramstou:35: taṃ śaktimantaṃ praṇamāmi devaṃ manthānasaṃjñaṃ jagadekasāram || 28 ||
GSP30kramstou:36: itthaṃ svaśaktikiraṇaughanutiprabandhān ākarṇya deva yadi me vrajasi prasādam |
